text: Naciye Kara (born January 1, 1993) is a Turkish women's football defender currently playing in the Turkish Women's Third Football League for Dörtyol Belediyespor with jersey number 9. She was a member of the Turkey girls' national U-17 team. ==Career== ===Club=== Naciye Kara obtained her license from Bucaspor in İzmir on April 28, 2006. She played for Bucaspor (2008–2010) and Konak Belediyespor (2010–2014) in the Women's First League. After appearing for the Women's Third League teams Sakarya Spor and Kılıçaslan Yıldızspor in the 2014–15 season, she returned to her former club Konak Belediyespor in January 2016. She debuted at the 2016–17 UEFA Women's Champions League qualifying round Group 9 match against Hibernians F.C.. In the second half of the 2016–17 season, she transferred to the Adana-based Dörtyol Belediyespor, who play in the Women's Third League. ==International== Between 2006 and 2009, she was a member of the Turkey girls' national U-17 team.
